description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for specifying the recording file format in an S3 recording sink configuration.
[``botocore``] Adds support for Hindi and Thai languages and additional Amazon Transcribe parameters to the StartMeetingTranscription API.
[``botocore``] Adds support for Hindi and Thai languages and additional Amazon Transcribe parameters to the StartMeetingTranscription API.
[``botocore``] Amazon GameLift supports creating Builds for Windows 2016 operating system.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for the new Lambda Protection feature.
[``botocore``] Support additional OTA states in GetOTAUpdate API
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Canvas adds ModelRegisterSettings support for CanvasAppSettings.

[``botocore``] Adds support for Amazon S3 compatible storage. AWS Snow Family customers can now use Amazon S3 compatible storage on Snowball Edge devices. Also adds support for V3_5S. This is a refreshed AWS Snowball Edge Storage Optimized device type with 210TB SSD (customer usable).

[``botocore``] You can now create encrypted API keys to use in a client application integration of the JavaScript CAPTCHA API . You can also retrieve a list of your API keys and the JavaScript application integration URL.
